note: I'm Canadian. I like science. I'm an RN. Covid is real. I'm part of the Jones Generation. I'm an introvert. I'm cynical. Not interested in conspiracy theories. I loooathe clowns! I'd call myself Agnostic with a Spinoza twist. I'm a no-nonsense type of person. I'm sarcastic. I love laughing - SO much. I'm a news junkie. Interested in politics. Go Leafs! Go Jayz! I love all music - except country. Be kind. People need to be who they wanna be! I'm NOT a conservative. This is me in a nutshell

fields.name: Likes
fields.value: Ice cream, classic cars, books, dogs, family, funny people, ALL the rock music, public heathcare

fields.name: Doesn't Like
fields.value: Clowns. Country music. Intolerant ideas. Lying capitalists. Christofascism (ALL the fascisms). Misogyny. Assault weapons.
